CustomField.formula: if(LEN(Payer_Street__c)>0, Payer_Street__c& ", ", "" )& if(LEN(Payer_City__c)>0, Payer_City__c& ", ", "" )& if(LEN(Payer_State_Province__c)>0, Payer_State_Province__c& ", ", "" )& if(LEN(Payer_Zip_Postal_Code__c)>0, Payer_Zip_Postal_Code__c& ", ","")& If(LEN(Payer_Country__c) >0, Payer_Country__c,"")
CustomField.label: Full Payer Address
